name: Bedtime Dread
description:
[ DOWNLOAD LINK BELOW ]

A game by NPJarcade, written in one week for LowRezJam2022.

- INFO -

Mum's going to bed now so it's time to brush your teeth, wash your face and brush your hair.  Oh and remember... don't let it get you.

- CONTROLS -

MOUSE - move hand

LEFT CLICK - interact with objects, hold left click and wiggle to wipe the mirror, brush teeth, wash face and brush hair

ESC - end the game (at any time)

- CREDITS -

Follow me on Twitter @NPJarcade

Programming, artwork and graphics by NPJarcade, UK, 2022.

Some SFX randomly generated using ChipTone - http://sfbgames.com/chiptone

Additional SFX from FindSounds - http://www.findsounds.com

Audio edited with Audacity - http://www.audacityteam.org/

Spooky music created using Beepbox - http://www.beepbox.co

- SPECIAL THANKS -

A huge thank you to my parntner for coming up with this steamy idea for the jam!
